summary: Peter G. Beeson was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). He is listed in payroll and certification reports from April, August, and December of 1978. These documents provide his name, and in some cases, his salary and gross pay during those periods. The documents do not specify his exact role within the SCAS, but his presence on payroll indicates he was a staff member.
significance: Peter G. Beeson's significance lies in his employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating his involvement in the investigation of the JFK assassination, although the specific nature and extent of his contribution are not detailed in these documents.
